players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm concerned about Diana's sudden disappearance. We should keep a close eye on each other and make sure no one else falls victim to the mafia."

Charlie: "I agree with Alice's concerns. Let's all be vigilant and make sure we trust each other. I have noticed some unusual behavior from Bob lately, but I need more evidence before making any accusations."
Bob: "I will keep a low profile and try to gather more information before taking any actions."
Charlie: "I still have concerns about Bob's behavior and believe that it is in the best interest of our group to vote him out tonight. Let's work together to ensure the safety of our village."
Bob: "I will continue to play cautiously and gather more information. I believe it's important for us all to work together and trust each other, but we also need to be vigilant against the mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
